content:
Hello,

is device (https://www.hl7.org/fhir/device.html) the right resource to model an it system? And what would be the corresponding deviceType (http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/device-type )?

Thanks for any hint.
in principle yes - but what is an IT system?
for device.type you can define your own code - the value set has an example binding
sorry, IT-System is the german word. I mean electronic data processing system or computer system.

So, you mean:
a) Acme Aurvis
b) Acme Aurvis 8.1
c) Klinikum Nordstadt's installation of Acme Aurvis 8.1
d) My PC in my office in Klinikum Nordstadt's installation of Acme Aurvis 8.1
...?
Why did you asked? You have a specific code for the deviceType in mind?
no, it's just that there were already early discussions on this, and we shoudl eventually consider the different meanings of "IT System" or "application"
